config.title: General Settings
config.coordinates.enabled.desc: Displays explanations when hovering over x and y properties.
config.coordinates.showSizes.desc: Displays explanations when hovering over w and h properties.
config.sprites.hoverPreview.desc: Shows a visual preview of the image when hovering over sprite paths.
config.resources.discovery.desc: Suggests sprites, audio files, and requires while typing.
